name: Castlevania (itch)
description:
Synopsis

Control some sort of mage trapped in a weird city full of zombies, necromancers, bats and more creepy stuff. Use your lightning power to attack, collect items to improve your skills, and jump your way to the end!

Controls
  • Left / Right Arrow: Move
  • Down Arrow: Crouch (Hold)
  • A: Attack
  • S: Jump
  • Up Arrow + A: Throw Item
